column4: I assume he doesn't want to lose the stuff on his Windows, Sidewinder1
You will also want to resize your Windows partition aquaboy11, but I dont know what you use to do that
Alternatively aquaboy11 delete Windows and just use Linux :D
I did that 12 years ago and never looked back
not had an issue with 64bit + wine here
a good start is giving the FULL model
it still needs clarifying, it helps a lot
under "Mouse and Touchpad" there is the Touchpad tab where you can disable touchpad tap to click, is that what you mean
I want to have two finger scroll, right and left click, and option to turn tapping off.
I suggest you check. Also install qsynaptics  and see if there are options there
